subScenes.name: 察觉情绪
subScenes.description: 朋友情绪低落，你主动关心

responses.text: Hey, you're not alone—I'm here for you.
responses.text_cn: 嘿，你不是一个人，我陪着你。

responses.text: That sounds rough. Want to talk about it?
responses.text_cn: 听起来好累啊，想聊聊吗？

qaPairs.usageNote: 用温和语气表达关心，别急着给建议

subScenes.name: 确认困扰
subScenes.description: 引导朋友说出具体烦恼

qaPairs.speakerText: I got passed over for the promotion again...

responses.text: That's so unfair. You totally deserved it.
responses.text_cn: 太不公平了，你完全配得上。
发生啥了？我想懂你的感受。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用开放式提问，让对方多说

subScenes.name: 情绪安抚
subScenes.description: 用共情语言缓解对方负面情绪

qaPairs.speakerText: I feel like such a failure...

responses.text_cn: 你不是失败，你只是在成长。

responses.text: Hey, remember when you nailed that project last year? You've got this.
responses.text_cn: 记得你去年那个项目多棒吗？你肯定行。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体回忆增强信心，避免空泛安慰

subScenes.name: 转移焦点
subScenes.description: 轻推话题，帮助对方放松心情

qaPairs.speakerText: I just can't get anything right lately.

responses.text: I know. How about we grab coffee and talk about something silly?
responses.text_cn: 我懂，咱去喝杯咖啡，聊点轻松的？

responses.text: Let's watch that dumb cat video you love.
responses.text_cn: 咱看那个你最爱的蠢猫视频吧。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体邀约转移注意力，别只说‘别想太多’

qaPairs.speakerText: I'm just tired of all this stress.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我真的受够这些压力了。

responses.text: Let's go for a walk after work—fresh air helps.
responses.text_cn: 下班后去散个步吧，新鲜空气有用。

responses.text: Yeah, stress sucks. Wanna binge-watch something?
responses.text_cn: 压力真烦，想一起刷剧吗？

qaPairs.usageNote: 提供简单可行的放松方案，增强行动感

subScenes.name: 温和告别
subScenes.description: 结束对话，留下持续支持感

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks for listening. I feel a bit better.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 谢谢你听我说，我感觉好多了。

responses.text: Anytime. I'm just a text away.
responses.text_cn: 随时找我，发条消息就行。

responses.text: Glad I could help. Let's do coffee this weekend?
responses.text_cn: 能帮上忙真好，这周末喝咖啡？

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体承诺强化支持感，别冷淡结束
